strings:
<se_low>Yangus: So they've gone an' reopened the casino!?
Of all the rotten luck!
<se_low>Yangus: If only I'd known earlier, I'd 'ave been 'ere on the first day!
<se_low>Yangus: I bet they 'ad some kinda special openin' offer, like 'avin' the slots pay out three times as often, or somefin'.
<se_low>Yangus: I couldn't get enough of the slots an' the odd bingo game when I was back in Pickham.
<se_low>Yangus: I was never much good at 'em, though.
<se_high>Jessica: Hm... I'm not a big fan of gambling, to tell you the truth.

<se_high>Jessica: You always hear these horrendous stories about people who get in over their heads and ruin their lives.<page>Jessica: They run up huge debts, and then they get into trouble with loan-sharks and other shady people.
<se_high>Jessica: But I guess a game or two of bingo never hurt anyone. And the healslime that picks the bingo balls is so cute!
<se_high>Jessica: Hm... I'm not a big fan of gambling, to tell you the truth.

<se_high>Jessica: You always hear these horrendous stories about people who get in over their heads and ruin their lives.<page>Jessica: They run up huge debts, and then they get into trouble with loan-sharks and other shady people.
<se_high>Jessica: But I guess a game or two of bingo never hurt anyone. And the healslime that picks the bingo balls is so cute!

<se_def>Angelo: I'm not just a whiz at poker!
I could win a fortune here at any card game you'd care to mention.
<se_def>Angelo: It's just a shame they don't actually have any...

<se_def>Angelo: My old man was a bankrupt aristocrat.
I'm sure he came here a few times in his day.

<se_def>Angelo: He probably squandered my entire inheritance on this very roulette wheel!
Thanks Dad! Better luck next time!
<se_low>Yangus: It'd be quicker to give the old echo flute a ‘Toot-oot-ot! ♪’ rather than askin' about town.
<se_low>Yangus: If we don't 'urry up an' find them seven orbs, Rhapthorne's gonna cause all kinds o' bother!
<se_high>Jessica: According to Empyrea, the only way to defeat Rhapthorne is by collecting orbs that contain the power of the great sages.
<se_high>Jessica: I suppose that means the seven great sages will be together again, just like in the old legends. But this time, they'll be in the form of orbs.
<se_def>Angelo: Empyrea's not very helpful, is she? The least she could've done was collect these orbs for us.
<se_def>Angelo: Oh! This is turning into quite a chore.
<se_high>Red: Now let's get somefin' straight. Puttin' a few gold coins 'ere and there on different games ain't gamblin'. Not real gamblin'.
<se_high>Red: You've gotta really go for it when ya think yer in wiv a chance. If yer gonna be a chicken about it, yer never gonna get the real enjoyment out of it.
<se_high>Red: Now let's get somefin' straight. Puttin' a few gold coins 'ere and there on different games ain't gamblin'. Not real gamblin'.
<se_high>Red: You've gotta really go for it when ya think yer in wiv a chance. If yer gonna be a chicken about it, yer never gonna get the real enjoyment out of it.
<se_low>Morrie: The art of running a casino is to make the clienti always think the next time, they are gonna win.
<se_low>Morrie: But Moro is not so stupido! No no. I do not think I'm gonna win the next time. ...I'm gonna win THIS time!
<se_def>Angelo: You really are an easy mark, aren't you, Morrie? I wish I'd known you back when I was a little less...scrupulous, shall we say?
<se_low>Morrie: The art of running a casino is to make the clienti always think the next time, they are gonna win.
<se_low>Morrie: But Moro is not so stupido! No no. I do not think I'm gonna win the next time. ...I'm gonna win THIS time!
<se_def>Angelo: You really are an easy mark, aren't you, Morrie? I wish I'd known you back when I was a little less...scrupulous, shall we say?
<se_high>Red: So at the end o' the day, it was Rhapthorne wot caused the casino to close down. Blimey, d'ya think 'e's got it in for gamblers? Brrr, I 'ope not!
<se_low>Morrie: Signor Golding, the proprietario of the casino, he used to take part in the Monster Arena.
<se_low>Morrie: He was a very busy man, so he was not coming for some times. But I still cannot believe he is defunct. It is a terribile news.
